description: Nigel Park, 71, fell off his bike after going over a ramp during a bicycle race, an inquest hears.
title: Isle of Man mountain biker died in 'freak' fall over ramp
title_page: Isle of Man mountain biker died in 'freak' fall over ramp - BBC News
maintext: The painter and decorator was a regular participant in the annual event, which takes competitors along a 47-mile (75km) route from the Point of Ayre at the island's most northern tip to Port Erin in the south.
